summary:
*excuse the really gross gif, I made it on my phone lmao*
Hello! I have recently hit my first thousand followers. I’ve used this...
body:
*excuse the really gross gif, I made it on my phone lmao*

Hello! I have recently hit my first thousand followers. I’ve used this blog for a little over a year and I can’t believe so many of you have stuck around. To repay each of my lovely followers (and anyone else who wants to participate), I am doing blog compliments! 

How does it work?

Send me an ask telling me your favorite food (off anon) and I will give you a compliment.

This phandom needs a lot more positivity so I feel like this would be a fitting activity. From the results of a poll I put out, you guys certainly agree! So behold, my inbox is here. I hope everyone that reads this has a good day!

blog.name: do-it-with-the-howell-lesters
blog.title: welcome!
blog.description:
Welcome to our phanfic blog!

Ashley and Holly here! Have a look through our works on the page below!

Mobile Masterlist

summary: Continuation of the "gimme a kiss first" prompt? "The bleach fumes are turning me off a bit in here."
question: Continuation of the "gimme a kiss first" prompt? "The bleach fumes are turning me off a bit in here."
answer:
(Love this continuation idea with our prompts! It’s like ‘create your own story’)

Continuation of this prompt.

Dan have a content little sigh into Phil’s lips as he sagged easily into the punk’s strong arms and was hoisted up.

His arms and legs found their way around Phil’s body as Phil pressed into him, and pressed his back into the wall. “My pretty boy. You’re gonna be late.”

Dan let a giggle escape, head thumping back once his boyfriend’s sinfully warm lips found his neck and sucked. “Don’t- hmm… care.”

Phil chuckled and found the front of his white skinny jeans, pulling the button open as Dan impatiently rolled his hips down against him, but Phil wrinkled his nose after a minute.

“The bleach fumes are turning me off a bit in here.”

Dan whined impatiently, panting. “Philly, please.” He palmed Phil over his jeans. “Need you.”

Phil let out a moan, but slumped his head into Dan’s shoulder. “Baby I can’t- it stinks.”

Dan softly touched the punk’s jet black hair and hopped down, as they themselves and tried to calm down. “Okay Philly.”

When they had calmed down, Dan pulled his little satchels into his shoulder, hips swinging as he sauntered out of the door. He heard Phil following him, “I’ll make it up to you Bear.”

Dan looked over his shoulder, fluttering his lashes. “You will Philly. Today preferably, these classes are boring.”

Phil smirked at the challenge as landed a firm slap on Dan’s bum as he opened his classroom door. “You’re on.”

send us some dialogue and we’ll write something

click here to read our other prompts

(Love this continuation idea with our prompts! It’s like ‘create your own story’)

blog.name: phandomsummerfics
blog.title: Phandom Summer Fics
blog.description:
A summer of cheesy plots, corny settings, fluffy, slow burn fics! 'Phandom Summer Fics' embraces it all!

Posting will be during the summer of 2019.

For links on mobile click here.

Run by Amethyst and Viki. For any questions message us on Tumblr or send us an email phandomsummerfics@yahoo.com

summary: To quote the wise words of Dan “how are you doing are you good good good that you are good” We’re slowly heading into December,...
body:
To quote the wise words of Dan “how are you doing are you good good good that you are good”

We’re slowly heading into December, which means, in a couple of months, posting will begin! If this is your first time hearing about Phandom Summer Fics, hi! You can read more about what this is just here! There’s still time to sign up if you want to join the fun and write about Dan and Phil being happy and sappy! If you’ve signed up already, welcome back! Be sure to check out one of the word war chats, they’re a lot of fun! 

Until next time! x

summary: Giada what the hell you just murdered me with your post!! And since people talked about ParentPhil already, let's talk about...
question: Giada what the hell you just murdered me with your post!! And since people talked about ParentPhil already, let's talk about ParentDan because like.. I can imagine him buying cute outfits for their kids, or braiding their hair and being the most supportive parent in the world. ♡
answer: dan would be the cutest parent, he would love to shop for cute outfits and matching accessories and he would spend hours researching the perfect aesthetic for each kid based on their personality, he would have like all these posts saved on pinterest and maybe even a file dedicated to all the perfect items of clothing he wants to buy for them. he would put so much thought into their clothes and then he will complain that phil has gone and gotten them some random shoes that don’t match the aesthetic of their other clothes.. but they love them so he learns to love them too :(

blog.name: do-it-with-the-howell-lesters
blog.title: welcome!
blog.description:
Welcome to our phanfic blog!

Ashley and Holly here! Have a look through our works on the page below!

Mobile Masterlist

summary: “I’m going to be late for class” “Fine but give me a kiss first”
question: “I’m going to be late for class” “Fine but give me a kiss first”
answer:
“I’m going to be late for class!”

Dan sighed dramatically as he pushed long, shiny black nails through his soft curls. He wasn’t annoyed, not even slightly, but he enjoyed playfully messing with his boyfriend.

Phil, the boyfriend in question, rolled his kohl lined eyes and leaned over the pastel boy before him as one tattooed arm raised to bracket him into the lockers. “Fine, but give me a kiss first.”

Dan giggled as he looked up through his lashes and made a point of inspecting his pristine nails, before curling them around the back of Phil’s strong neck.

“If I must.”

Phil ducked down and kissed him hotly, his free hand coming to grip the bare, slender waist that peaked out under the cropped pink hoodie. His muscular thigh pressed forward and rested between Dan’s legs.

Dan didn’t seem at all bothered as their fellow students bustled around the two of them towards their classes. He seemed even less bothered when the insatiable punk hauled them into the nearest storage closet.

send us some dialogue and we’ll write something

click here to read our other prompts
